definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

pinyin: gao1 qing1 shu4 zi4 dian4 shi4

sentences.english: It is that quantitative difference that drives the interest in digital TV.
sentences.chinese: 正是这种质量差别激发我们对数字电视的兴趣。

sentences.english: Perhaps they do not realize what the DTV revolution offers.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们并没有意识到数字电视革命将会带来什么。

sentences.english: Digital TV would be displayed in rear seat monitors.
sentences.chinese: 数字电视将会出现在高端汽车后头枕上。

sentences.english: The digital TV is one of the new developing medias in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 数字电视是近年来新兴的媒体之一。

sentences.english: Buy a digital TV converter that will convert the box.
sentences.chinese: 购买数字电视转换盒，将转换。

sentences.english: We are also eyeing opportunities in digital TV and telecommunication sectors.
sentences.chinese: 我们也会着眼数字电视和通讯业的机遇。

sentences.english: All of these developments bring opportunity and challenge for our DTV industry.
sentences.chinese: 这使我们国家数字电视产业发展面临着机遇和挑战。

definition: set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc

pinyin: gao1 qing1 shu4 zi4 dian4 shi4

definition: standard definition (TV or video image quality)
